attributes.action: Discourage the use of agism by this Goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To ask the Prime Minister and this Labour Goverment to cease the agism in the case of 1 Penshioner against another.
A Penshioner at age 75 gets a free TV licence and yet 1 at 65 whom is on the same penshion cannot claim. This has to be wrong and should be righted what is good enough for 1 group 75's should be good enough 65's.
